question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. horse drawn carriage
B. suv facing the camera
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The SUV facing the camera is positioned closer to the foreground (near the red curb and lamppost), while the horse-drawn carriage is further down the street, behind the SUV, making it clearly further away in 3D space.
